'''Glowing Gem''' is a special refinement material for the event-exclusive weapon [[Fading Twilight]].

It is obtained from the [[Perilous Trail (Event)|Perilous Trail]] Event:
* [[Perilous Trail (Event)#Event Shop|Event Shop]]
* [[Perilous Trail (Event)/Kaleidoscope Cage|Kaleidoscope Cage Challenges]]
* [[Perilous Trail (Event)/Insurgent Twilight|Insurgent Twilight Challenges]]
